footnotes: Kabila ya Thamud ilimkanusha Swaleh katika Ujumbe wake na wito wake, na kwa hivyo ikawa wamewakanusha Mitume wote, kwa kuwa asli ya Ujumbe ni moja, na lengo ni moja.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
